snippet.title: Eternal Vigil - Early Access Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2543750

Embark on an epic quest to defend the sacred crystal from relentless waves of monstrous invaders. Harness your unique combat skills, strategically deploy your powerful turrets, and reach your full potential to push back the dark forces. Will you rise as the ultimate defender or succumb to the shadows?
The fate of the crystal rests in your hands. Will you rise to the occasion and stand as an unwavering sentinel against the encroaching darkness, or will the hordes succeed in shattering the last remnants of hope? Your decisions, reflexes, and strategy will determine the outcome of "Eternal Vigil". Defend the crystal at all costs and etch your name into the annals of legendary defenders.

Socials:
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/embereyeofficial
X -  https://twitter.com/EmberEyeStudio
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@embereyestudio
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094322662442
